pr_title: Bugfixes related to the maintenance windows picker

timeline.message:
Bugfix: Pre-select action chains radio, when maintenance windows are empty

In this case, the action chain picker is the only picker visible on the
page, so it must be preselected.

Both the React and the Struts picker are affected.

timeline.bodyText:
Just some really minor nitpick. This function uses alert-info, but is called ...Warning.
Maybe call it ...Info?.
This is just a suggestion, I am totally fine if you ignore it 😄
